name: Wild Biker Boys
description:
Game Description

The robot wants to play with you again. They move you to the same simulation with the same bikers, but something happened to them that Padar wants you to see.

WBB is cheap ms paint crossover of LBB (Loveless Biker Boys) I advise you to check this novel first of all.

Warnings

Read them before opening the game!

Shaking screen, eyestrain and photosensitivity, loud music and unnerving sounds, many weird moments, violence, gore, main character death, worms/maggots, body horror (kind of), suicide attempt by one of the characters, selfcest, kind of yandere characters, many detailed descriptions of rotting and decomposition.

Meet your old friends.

Padar

Your robot friend. You play their game. Their will reward you with a surprise again.

Dice Сarroll

Still the boss of his gang, maybe now you can count him as two. He's two different personalities from one person stitched together.

Varai Vard

A living dead man teeming with various living creatures (including his new "friends") and serving as their home. He's stinky.

Jatay

Even more ugly than before. His appearance matches his character. Puns more than before.

Jeff Levasseur

He's nice and a little evil. He's still most normal person in the gang, but it seems he is gradually losing his mind.

Current Game Features:

4 different routes

11 endings

24 CGs (drawn in ms paint)

I will add more illustrations and endings as well as a Russian translation if I see that someone is interested in my game.
